action.action-desc: Mr. Langevin (for himself, Ms. Bonamici, and Ms. Stefanik) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To amend the STEM Education Act of 2015 to require the National Science Foundation to promote the integration of art and design in STEM education, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the STEM to STEAM Act of 2017.

section.header: Integrating art and design into National Science Foundation informal STEM education program
section.text: Section 3 of the STEM Education Act of 2015 (42 U.S.C. 1862q) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (3), by striking the period and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: the integration of art and design in STEM educational programs.

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (3), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (4), by striking the period and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: design and testing of programming that integrates art and design in STEM education to promote creativity and innovation.
